name: WP-Smooth-Scroll
author: Ahmedur Rahman Shovon

sections.description:
WP-Smooth-Scroll is a plugin that helps users to scroll smoothly to top of the page.

Main features of WP-Smooth-Scroll are:

  • WP-Smooth-Scroll is simple to set up and use.
  • It has options to select the position of WP-Smooth-Scroll button.
  • It wont create problem in smaller screen like mobile or tablet.
  • It is smooth and dynamic.
  • WP-Smooth-Scroll has an eye catching effect with nice hover effect.

Plugin Demo: Plugin Support
sections.installation:
1. Download and unzip the latest release zip file

  2. If you use the WordPress plugin uploader to install this plugin skip to step 4.

  3. Upload the entire plugin directory to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory

  4. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress Administration
sections.faq:
Q. Can it be useful in the pages too?

A. Yes it is can be used both in posts and pages.

Q. Will this plugin automatically hide in smaller screen?

A. As we dont need smooth scroll to top option in tablet or mobile phones, this plugin will automatically hide in these small screen devices.

Q. Can I be able to select the position of WP-Smooth-Scroll button?

A. You can select any position from Bottom-Right, Bottom-Middle or Bottom-Left as your wish. By default it is Bottom-Right.
